trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Porter
There were no other sightings in Porter on or around April 5th 2008
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Details i went outside on my front porch and was drinking coffe it was about 11:30 pm it was a cool crisp night and i like to just sit out there and something to my left cought my eye up in the sky. there was a significatly brighter light in the sky in a part of the sky where there is not any bright stars out at that time usually its just those little bitty ones that you can just tell that they are there because they are so far away. this made those other stars look like fore ground.it was at first glance just a bright star but it had never been there before so i went ahead and sat down and just watched it thinking wow that sure is neat how it can change colors like that.i got up and ran in the house were it was dark closed my eyes and was thinking its just my eyes they are tired this is just my eyes being tired. i closed them and counted till 120 and took a deep breath and went back outside rushed back to the spot i was standing and it was still there i was freking out i could not beleive what i was seeing.i was totally floored. i tried to get it on video camera but i did not have night vision on the camera, so i could not see anything through the veiw finder. my eyes were relaxed and i was not tired fully alert this thing started to move up and down sort of squiggilly movements and started this weired flashing type sequence with all of these different colors in a ballish circular motion the only way i can describe it was as morris code or something it would at the same time as changing colors would move. it went along in a fig. 8 pattern and up down and sideways.then it would just sit still for like 10 minutes or so.and do it again it did this about 4 times. the second time it did it i saw another similar shape only bright white come across the sky towards it in its direction and do the same thing back to it and then it went passed it towards my left and pass it up.shortly after that around 12:45am or so i swear these white streaks of really white lights would sort of come out of the bottom of it they looked like tails off of a shooting star or something only no sparkles more of a smokiness or light trail there was only about 4 or 5 of these they also went to the left of the object and it was sort of like it was following the other one.then at 1:12am my husband came home from playing card with the neighbors and i told him about it and said you have got to see this this is real i am not crazy you have got to see this i am serious look it! so he 's like come on your crazy and i'm like just watch real carefully and a few minutes later it started doing those weired patterns again and it moved up down if you were looking at a clock it moved in the 1 oclock position from were it was previously sitting then back to were it was all the while changing colors and eveything it was doing before sticking pretty close to the same pattern everytime.jimmy saw that and he's like did you just see that also and i'm like, told you so, our daughter woke up and he went in and laid down with her.i stayed out there for another hour watching it seeing ehat else it would do but it stopped moving as much and just stayed white. then it appeared to be moving toward my direction at that time it was a whitish color turning gold and orange and yellows then white agaian(probably our pollution thats up there because the moon does that sometimes here). it was getting easier to see and looked a little bit bigger that was around 2:42am. and started this weired flashing type sequence the only way i can describe it was as morris code or something it always paused after the patterns and the changing of the colors. it was almost 3 am and i had to get some sleep that was the last time i have seen it i have stayed up every night and at the same time gone out side to see if it has been there and it is just not there the last two nights it has been cloudy and so i have not been able to see anything its going to rain soon. i have stayed up many nights looking at the stars from were i was sitting on the porch and i can honestly say that i have never seen anything like that before and i am now always going to look for it now on.
Summary: a round bright distinct light that changed color and shape and movement pattern.
